title: 3 hurt in separate weekend shootings
content:
DANVILLE, Ill.
DANVILLE -- Police are investigating two weekend shootings which left three people injured.
The first happened about 9 pm, Friday, in the area of Plum and Griggs. A 17-year old was shot in the leg.
Then, about 4:30 pm, Sunday, two men suffered gunshot wounds at Deerwood and Moore. One was shot in the leg; the other in his wrist.
Anyone with information is asked to call Crime Stoppers. You can remain anonymous and may earn a cash reward.
Danville Police
